rooms.name: Entrance & Living Area
rooms.description: A minimalist open-plan area combining living and dining spaces with a small foyer to greet visitors. Designed with large glass windows for natural light, adhering to Vastu by placing the entrance on the north side.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: A compact but fully functional kitchen integrated into the living space, featuring minimalistic cabinetry and stainless steel finishes. Placed adjacent to the living area with a direct view of the entrance for energy flow according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A minimalist bathroom located near the kitchenette, designed for convenience and efficiency. Includes essential fixtures such as a shower and sink.

openings.description: Large glass door with minimalist design, aligning with Vastu principles of energy flow.
Large windows providing ample natural light while ensuring privacy. South and east exposures are considered auspicious in Vastu for personal growth.

garage.description: A two-car garage located adjacent to the entrance, designed with a modern minimalist aesthetic, incorporating sufficient ventilation and storage.

additional_spaces.name: Utility Closet
additional_spaces.description: A small space dedicated for utilities and maintenance supplies, placed discreetly near the kitchenette area.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom & Study
rooms.description: A split-level studio apartment where the master bedroom and a dedicated study area are combined. The design emphasizes open space with flexible partitioning for work or relaxation, ensuring adequate privacy.

rooms.name: Balcony / Terrace
rooms.description: A compact outdoor space attached to the bedroom for fresh air and relaxation, designed following minimalist principles.

openings.location: Central area connecting ground floor and first floor
openings.description: A sleek, modern staircase with a minimalist design that adheres to safety norms and local building regulations.

openings.location: North wall of the master bedroom
openings.description: Large window enhancing natural light for both relaxation and work, positioned according to Vastu guidelines to promote positive energy in personal spaces.
